sentences.sContent: But meteorologist David Beachler from the National Weather Service says not to worry.
sentences.sContent_eng: But meteorologist David Beachler from the National Weather Service says not to worry.
sentences.sCn: 但是国家气象局的气象专家大卫·贝赤勒表示并不需要担心。

sentences.sContent: Suppose every sensor gives perfectly accurate readings of temperature, pressure, humidity, and any other quantity a meteorologist would want.
sentences.sContent_eng: Suppose every sensor gives perfectly accurate readings of temperature, pressure, humidity, and any other quantity a meteorologist would want.
sentences.sCn: 再假定每个传感器都极极端准确地读出了温度、气压、温度和气象学家需要的任何其他数据。

sentences.sContent: The son of an immigrant carworker in Detroit, he had become an air cadet at the age of 17 and then a member of the army air forces, in which he trained as a meteorologist.
sentences.sContent_eng: The son of an immigrant carworker in Detroit, he had become an air cadet at the age of 17 and then a member of the army air forces, in which he trained as a meteorologist.
sentences.sCn: 他是美国密歇根州底特律一位汽车工人移民的儿子，17岁时进入了空军军官学校，并在那时加入了美国空军部队，接着就在那受到了作为气象学者的训练。

words.tran: 流星；[气象] 大气现象
